msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at left and right. Kolleais in right center of the sheet. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. Left margin over 3.5 cm. and right margin over 1.5 cm. Approximately 3 cm. between the two columns. (TC)

;Papiris, cultivator of the 80th cleruchy;;orchard taxes for the 12th year in the administrative district of Patsontis, apomoira drachma 1, chalki 2, naubion obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5;;eparourion obols 4, chalki 2, surcharges obols 0.5, kollybos obols 0.5, in total drachmas 2, obols 2;;date tax for the 12th year drachmas 15, surcharges drachma 1, in total drachmas 16;;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Theon, son of Theon, grandson of Petheus, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Gaios for the tax for the epistrategos;charged on wool-shearers for the13th year, drachmas 12, surcharges obols 5, in total drachmas 12, obols 5.;Ammonous, son of Pabous through the agency of Syros, son of Papos, a dyer;;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of oil obols 4, chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1, obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3, obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5, chalki, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 11, obol 1.5, chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 13, obol 1.5, chalki 2;;Priskos alias Pasoxis, son of Satabous, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thermothis, drachmas 12;;in total for the day, drachmas 192, obols 10;;(Phamenoth) 27 likewise:;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Herakles, mother Tauris, drachmas 16;;Heras, son, mother Tamystha, drachmas 16;;Heras, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 24;;Apion, son of Ammonios, grandson of Apion, mother Apollonous, drachmas 12;;Ammonarion, daughter of Esouris, through Petheus (son of Panabos);;(in the left margin: drachmas 12, obols 21) land tax for the 12th year drachmas 6, obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives, obols 5.5, naubion obols 4, surcharges drachma 1, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 4, obol 1, surcharges obols 2, chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 11, obol 1.5."
